### Continuous results
``` {r echo = F, results = 'asis'} 
for(i in continuous){
  lab = data_dict[data_dict$variable == i,]$variable_label %>% unique()
  k <- print.cont(get({{i}}))
  j = if(is_empty(lab)){paste(i)} else{lab}

  print(k %>% kbl(caption = paste0("Results for: ", j)) %>% kable_styling())
  # %>%
  #         kbl(caption = paste0("Results for: ", j)) %>%
  #         kable_styling()
}
```
